titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 50th anniversary of the Combined Federal Campaign.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6672)
Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. (text of measure as introduced: CR S6672)

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 229.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 11/16/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Commemorates the 50th anniversary of the Combined Federal Campaign.
